name: Professional Instrument Courses
about: Professional Instrument Courses (PIC) is a renowned flying school specializing in Instrument Rating training since 1980. We offer a unique, intensive 10-day program that allows students to become proficient and confident instrument pilots quickly and efficiently. Our instructors are dedicated to providing full-time, uninterrupted training, ensuring students learn faster and retain more of what they learn. We come to you, training at your location, making it convenient for those with busy schedules. With a focus on safety and competence, PIC has trained thousands of pilots across the country, earning a reputation for producing some of the best IFR pilots. Our comprehensive and logically sequenced training ensures that you gain the knowledge and skills necessary to fly safely in IFR conditions. Trust PIC for your Instrument Rating needs and start flying with confidence today.
